List of all members.

Detailed Description

Standard interface for character devices. e.g. GPIB, serial port, ....

Member Function Documentation

const std::vector< char > & XCharInterface::buffer (   )  const
 

Buffer is Thread-Local-Strage. Therefore, be careful when you access multi-interfaces in one thread.

See also:
XThreadLocal
